metadata.title: CVE-2023-51782 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. rose_ioctl innet/rose/af_rose.c has a use-after-free because of a rose_accept racecondition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
